channel.title: Problem with Soundcloud website?
channel.description:
For some strange reason, whenever I try to listen to my songs on the Soundcloud website it sounds awful, everyone else's tracks sound fine.
Whenever I listen to my tracks on the Soundcloud apps, it sounds normal again...
Can anybody explain why?
hmmmmmmm

item.title: Problem with Soundcloud website?
item.dc:creator: Little_Baby
item.description:
It might also be your sound card…

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Soundcloud website?
item.dc:creator: nep
item.description:
It could happen for multiple reasons.
It probably has to do with your mixing quality, since you say it only happens to your songs.

Your song probably sounds fine on your phone because the sound driver is the one you used to create the song. Your computer has a different (and likely worse) sound driver, which processes sound differently. It may cut out, or change some frequencies, making your song sound a little different.

You said your songs sound muffled? Usually the better the mix, the clearer the song sounds. Try balancing out the frequencies in the mix (i.e. highpass, lowpass, volume).

I not actually very experienced in mixing, so I can’t really tell you many specific things that may help. Maybe do some research?

Also, please note that this is just speculation, I’ve had this problem in the past with my songs, so I’m just telling you what worked for me.

Hope this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Soundcloud website?
item.dc:creator: Cornea
item.description:
It’s like if you were to put it through an eq and bring all low frequencies down

Read full topic
